summary: The code imports the 'colored' function from 'termcolor' library, then prints a welcome message with colored text. The colors are used for decorative purposes to create a visually appealing output.

details.comment: The code imports the 'colored' function from 'termcolor' library, then prints a welcome message with colored text. The colors are used for decorative purposes to create a visually appealing output.
details.content:
from termcolor import colored
print()
print(colored("    -","red"))
print(colored("   |    ","red")+colored("            ___  __  __","cyan"))
print(colored("  / \   ","red")+colored("|    /|  /  ___ |   |  |","cyan"))
print(colored(" \  _\  ","red")+colored("|__ / | /__ ___ |   |__|","cyan"))
print()
print(colored("""To make everything
executable, analyzable, controllable.""","yellow"))
print()
